body.head:
Tm Stephani
Mosyer
body.ab:
In the name of god amen I
Stephen Mosyer of Bridford in the County of Devon Merchant at presen resident
at London doe make this my present last will and testament I doe will that all such debts
wch are owing and shalbe owing by me at the tyme of my death and as well in my owne
right as in the right of my Executorshipp of the last will and Testament of my late
brother Thomas Mosyer deceased shalbe paid and discharged with all Convenient and :
possible expedition And I doe make my wife Mary my full and sole Executrix of this my
present last will and Testament And I doe give to my sayd wife Mary for Terme of
her naturall life all and eny my Coppie hold lands and Tenements wth the appurtenances
in the Parish of St Salvior in Southwarke in the County of Surry held of the Maner of
David Garden paying the rent yearly ffive pounds of lawfull English money in the
moneth of May to my sister Anne Rumney in discharge and satisfaction of ffiue
pounds yearely given or charged by my late brother George Mosyer deceased vnto
the sayd Anne Rumney And alsoe fortie shillings yearely to the poore of St Thomas
Hospitall in Southwarke in discharge of soemuch formerly given or charged And alsoe
I give to my sayd wife Mary for Terme of her naturall life my Tenement with
the appurtenances in longe lane in the parish of St Sepulcher London And I doe will
and order that my sayd wife may give and dispose the same lands and Tenements
and euery or any of them to my Sonnes John Mosyer and Joseph Mosyer and my daughter
Susan or any of them (but to none other) as shee shall thinke fitt in her good discretion And
I doe will and order that for the lively hood and portions of my my sayd Sonnes John and ~
Joseph and my daughter Susan, my sayd Executrix shall pay and allowe out of my Estate ~ ~
to euery of them a Competencie and a respective part as to my sayd Executrix shalbe ~ ~
thought meete Provided allwaies and my will and mynde is, that if my sayd wife Mary
doe departe this present life or be married That then and in such case the sayd Executrix XXXX
as to my sayd wife to be voide And in such case I doe make my sayd sonne John ~ ~ ~
Mosyer my Executor And doe order and will that my sayd sonne John Mosyer shall
or may sell and dispose of Certen of my leases and pay and allowe vnto him selfe and
the sayd Joseph and Susan respectively such Competencie and portion as to my sayd
wife shalbe thought fill (if shee be then liveing) (if dead) the same to be referred to my
sayd Sonne John Mosyer to allowe such parte or portion to him selfe and to the sayd Joseph
and Susan or any or either of them as he the sayd John in his conscience and discretion shall ~
see most meete In testimony whereof I have herevnto put my hand and seale dated the ~ ~
three and twentith day of July Anno dnĩ one thousand sixe hundred fourtie seaven And in
the three and Twentith yeare of the Raigne of our Soueraigne Lord King Charles of England
&c By me Steven Mosyer Sigillat publicat̃ et delibat̃ in pũlia sigmd Johannæ Read signũ
Elizabetha Minchard et Roberti Minchard Notarij publici
